About Me

Frontend Web Developer!

Experienced frontend developer specializing in Vue.js, with expertise in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Proficient in TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, jQuery, and a range of web development technologies. skilled in transforming designs into high-quality, user-centric web applications.
